mapper.select: SELECT SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, SELLER_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, SELLER_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT SEQ, SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, SELLER_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, SELLER_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS SEQ, SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, SELLER_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, SELLER_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM (SELECT SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, SELLER_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, SELLER_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM seller_community ORDER BY SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID DESC) ) WHERE seq >= #{startPostNo} ) WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endPostNo}

SELECT SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID, S_ID, POST_TYPE_ID, SELLER_COMMUNITY_CONTENT, SELLER_COMMUNITY_DATE_CREATED, COMMUNITY_LIKE_CNT, COMMUNITY_CUM_CNT FROM seller_community WHERE SELLER_COMMUNITY_POST_ID=#{sellerCommunityPostId}
